VARDESC: Did you find that your usual number of drinks had much less effect on you than it once did in the last 12 months?
Did you find that you had to drink much more than you once did to get the effect you wanted in the last 12 months?
Did you drink as much as a fifth of liquor in one day, that would be about 20 drinks, or 3 bottles of wine, or as much as 3 six-packs of beer in a single day in the last 12 months?
Did you increase your drinking because the amount you used to drink didn’t give you the same effect anymore in the last 12 months?
Did you more than once want to stop or cut down on your drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you more than once try to stop or cut down on your drinking but found you couldn’t do it in the last 12 months?
Did you have a period when you ended up drinking more than you meant to in the last 12 months?
Did you have a period when you kept on drinking for longer than you had intended to in the last 12 months?
Did you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months?
Did you find yourself shaking or your hands trembling in the last 12 months?
Did you feel anxious or nervous in the last 12 months?
Did you feel sick to your stomach or vomit when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months?
Did you feel more restless than is usual for you in the last 12 months?
Did you find yourself sweating or your heart beating fast in the last 12 months?
Did you see, feel, or hear things that weren’t really there when the effects of alcohol were wearing off in the last 12 months?
Did you have fits or seizures in the last 12 months?
Are at least 2 items marked "Yes" in column b, items 9-16

You just mentioned that you had SOME bad aftereffects when stopping or cutting down on drinking in the last 12 months. Did at least 2 of these experiences happen around the same time DURING the last 12 months?
Did you take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, advil or tylenol, to get over any of the bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, advil or tylenol, to keep from having any of these bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you have a period when you spent a lot of time drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you have a period when you spent a lot of time being sick or getting over the bad aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink-like work, school, or associating with friends or relatives in the last 12 months?
Did you give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure in order to drink in the last 12 months?
Did you continue to drink even though you knew it was making you feel depressed, uninterested in things, or suspicious or distrustful of other people in the last 12 months?
Did you continue to drink even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse in the last 12 months?

Did you continue to drink even though you had experienced a prior blackout, that is, awakened the next day not being able to remember some of the things you did while drinking or after drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you feel a very strong urge or desire to drink in the last 12 months?
Did you want a drink so badly that you couldn’t think of anything else in the last 12 months?
Did you have a period when your drinking or being sick from drinking often interfered with taking care of your home or family in the last 12 months?

Did you have job or school troubles because of your drinking or being sick from drinking-like missing too much work, not doing your work well, being demoted or losing a job, or being suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school in the last 12 months?
Did you continue to drink even though it was causing you problems at school or at work in the last 12 months?
Did you more than once drive a car or other vehicle while you were drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle and have an accident while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months?
Did you more than once drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle after having too much to drink in the last 12 months?

Did you get into situations while drinking or after drinking that increased your chances of getting hurt-like swimming, using machinery, or walking in a dangerous area or around heavy traffic in the last 12 months?
Did you have arguments or problems with your spouse or partner or family or friends because of your drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you continue to drink even though it was causing you trouble with your family or friends in the last 12 months?
Did you get into physical fights while drinking or right after drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you ride in a car as a passenger while you were drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you drive a car, motorcycle, truck, or other vehicle and injure yourself or someone else in an accident while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months?
Did you accidentally injure yourself or someone else in any way other than motor vehicle accidents, like a bad fall or bad cut, while you were under the influence of alcohol in the last 12 months?
Did you more than once get arrested, held at a police station, or have any other legal problems because of your drinking in the last 12 months?
Did you ride in a car or other vehicle while the driver was drinking in the last 12 months?
